item.author: Jiajian Fu
item.description: This post will introduce the paper I participated in the research project about the joining of plastic and metal parts in the automotive industry.I studied more than 100 related documents, and formed a group led by the first author and corresponding author.

item.title: Photographyï½œ2024 Miramar air show
item.author: Jiajian Fu
item.description: On September 27-29, the Miramar Air Show, the largest military air show is returning as Americaâ€™s Air Show to provide a unique and special flight line experience with immersive experiences, static displays, and daytime shows that feature military demonstration teams, civilian aerobatic teams, aerial solo acts, vintage aircraft and warbirds.

item.title: Additive Manufacturingï½œIntroduction of Student 3D Printing and Additive Manufacturing Association
item.author: Jiajian Fu
item.description: The Chongqing University 3D Printing and Additive Manufacturing Association was established in October 2015 and is considered an A-level student organization at the university. We belong to the esteemed College of Mechanical Engineering. Our main focus lies in promoting and advancing the field of 3D printing and additive manufacturing. Our dedicated laboratory for association activities Some works of our association Since our inception, we have been actively involved in research and development.

item.title: Additive Manufacturingï½œTopology Design of Thermal-Mechanical Coupling Structure Based on Multi-objective Optimization
item.author: Jiajian Fu
item.description: Out of interest, I joined my manufacturing course teacher Kun Li’s laboratory (HÏ€AM of State Key Laboratory of Mechanical Transmission in Chongqing University) to learn about engineering analysis of additive manufacturing, mainly focusing on shape memory alloys and multi-objective based Optimal Thermal-Mechanical Coupling Structure Topology Design

item.title: Patent Publicationï½œA Device With Thermoelectric Power Generation And Heat Dissipation Functions And A Thermoelectric Power Generation Method
item.author: Jiajian Fu
item.description: During my freshman year, I participated in the National Undergraduate Energy Conservation and Emission Reduction Social Practice and Science and Technology Competition Project, and was responsible for the 3D model design, rendering and sample production. Won the third prize at the national level and applied for an invention patent
